nodes.text: Jarvanam was a planet located within the star system of the same name, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Astal sector. Around the year 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of the Baradis School of Technology, a covert criminal training organization and member of the Tenloss Syndicate.

Jarvanam was mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Jarvanam system, and therefore the planet Jarvanam, in grid square P-17.
